thread.title: Quebec mosque shooting: At least five dead after 'three gunmen' fired on up to 40 people
thread.title_full: Quebec mosque shooting: At least five dead after 'three gunmen' fired on up to 40 people

author: Steve Robson
title: Quebec mosque shooting: At least five dead after 'three gunmen' fired on up to 40 people
text:
Get daily   Could   
At least five people are dead after gunmen opened fire in a mosque in Canada. 
A witness said there were three gunmen during the attack on the Quebec City Islamic Cultural Centre during evening prayers on Sunday. 
Around 40 people were inside at the time. 
We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story.
